templates Package¶

adminBulkDelTemplatesController Module¶

fla.gr controller for deleting lots of templates

For more information, see: https://github.com/JoshAshby/

http://xkcd.com/353/

Josh Ashby 2013 http://joshashby.com joshuaashby@joshashby.com
